entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
